thread.title: Free Family Fun Pass with entree purchases at Olive Garden
thread.title_full: Free Family Fun Pass with entree purchases at Olive Garden

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Free Family Fun Pass with entree purchases at Olive Garden
text:
Free Family Fun Pass with entree purchases at Olive Garden Get a beach bag full of BOGOs with Summer Savings card 
Buy-one-get-one free cruises on the Jungle Queen, savings at restaurants, Sawgrass Mills and 40 BOGO deals on fun in the sun from Sunny.org. 
Buy-one-get-one free cruises on the Jungle Queen, savings at restaurants, Sawgrass Mills and 40 BOGO deals on fun in the sun from Sunny.org. Doreen Christensen Sun Sentinel Kids get in free at laser tag, bowling, zoos, mini golf and more with a Family Fun Pass from Olive Garden. 
Fall just got a lot more fun thanks to Olive Garden. 
Get a free Family Fun Pass with purchase ofone entree and one kids meal dining on Monday through Friday at the Italian restaurant chain. 
Passes offer free entry for kids with a paying adult or child admission to fun local attractions, including movies, laser tag, bowling, zoos, roller skating, mini golf and more.Enter your ZIP code at the link below to preview participating venues. 
You can get multiple passes with multiple purchases. 
Click here for the deal. The offer ends on Oct. 23. 
Like Doreen's Deals on Facebook ; follow Doreen Christensen on Twitter@PrettyGoodIdeas and sign up for Deals text alerts
